Today I chose PR 4619 for discussion!

refactor(algebra/*): Attempt to generalize the universal property
Created by @Eric Wieser (@eric-wieser) on 2020-10-14
Labels: WIP, merge-conflict

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?

This PR was very much a WIP. I think #4908 is a good step for generalizing, which is already used in other parts of mathlib. Beyond that, it's tempting to redefine Î¹ = lift id (and not mark it irreducible), which might make proofs easier
